026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.dispatcher;
027    
028    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.DirectJNgineException;
029    
030    public class DispatcherConfigurationException extends DirectJNgineException {
031      private static final long serialVersionUID = -6835277883970557039L;
032    
033      protected DispatcherConfigurationException(String message, Throwable cause) {
034        super(message, cause);
035      }
036    
037      public static DispatcherConfigurationException forUnableToInstantiateDispatcher(Class<? extends Dispatcher> cls,
038          Exception cause) {
039        assert cls != null;
040        assert cause != null;
041        
042        return new DispatcherConfigurationException( "Unable to create a dispatcher of type '" + cls + "'", cause);
043      }
044    
045    }
